product_name: Marin Hidden Canyon 20" Girls' Bike - White Purple - 2012 Overstock
long_description: The white girls' Marin Hidden Canyon 20 in. Bike boasts all the performance of an adult mountain bike but in a kid-friendly size. Front suspension and a tough, nimble frame keeps her ride comfortable. 6061 aluminum frame features double-butted construction and shaped top and bottom tubes to withstand demanding use. Suntour XCT-JR suspension fork works just like the suspension on adult bikes; 40mm of travel soaks up bumps and helps rider maintain control. Double-chainring crankset is paired with a 7-speed cassette for a total of 14 gear combinations to facilitate easy spinning. SRAM MRX twist shifters work fast and are easy to use with a quick flick of the wrist. Linear-pull hand brakes provide controlled deceleration. Durable Kenda dirt/street tires provide a stable ride at slow speeds and work great on packed trails or around the cul-de-sac. Specs on the Marin Hidden Canyon 20 in. girls' bike are subject to change. Overstock.
short_description: The white girls' Marin Hidden Canyon 20 in. Bike boasts all the performance of an adult mountain bike but in a kid-friendly size. Front suspension and a tough, nimble frame keeps her ride comfortable.
